name: MSCRMSetVersion
description: Updates the version of a PowerApps/CDS/Dynamics 365 Solution
author: MichaÃ«l Hompus
helpMarkDown: Version can be updated in solution present in an environment or unpacked files in source control

inputs.name: solutionName
inputs.label: Solution Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique name of the solution you want to update

inputs.name: unpackedFilesFolder
inputs.label: Unpacked Files Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder in source control containing the unpacked solution files extracted using SolutionPackager.exe

inputs.name: versionNumber
inputs.label: Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the solution version. This can be a fixed value or you can use variables e.g. '1.0.0.0' or '5.0.0$(Rev:.r)'
